tool.name: Show Quality Score Distribution
tool.help:
.. class:: warningmark
Your file needs to be a specific Galaxy **qualityscore** datatype (unless it is in zip format). Please click on the pencil symbol in the history panel to change the file format.
-----
**What it does**
This tool takes quality score files and outputs a pdf file showing score distribution.
Currently, the tool accepts two file formats:
- fasta: for **454** data - tabular: for **Solexa** data. Only take the maximal value from each 4 quality scores.
You can also upload your files in a zip file format and use this tool.
-----
**Example**
454 data::
>seq1 23 33 34 25 28 28 28 32 23 34 27 4 28 28 31 21 28
Solexa data::
-40 -40 40 -40 -40 -40 -40 40 -40 -40 40 -40 40 -40 -40 -40 -40 -40 -40 40
boxplot::
For showing purpose, this figure is not generated from the above examples.
